user_question: How can I synthesize aspirin in a lab setting, and can you generate an image of the molecular structure of aspirin?
final_answer: To synthesize aspirin, react salicylic acid with acetic anhydride in the presence of an acid catalyst. Image of the molecular structure of aspirin generated. Safety precautions: Wear protective eyewear, gloves, and work in a well-ventilated area. Handle acetic anhydride with care as it is corrosive.
